DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; NO QUARTER ASKED
DOC.TEXT: Scalpers outside Stanford Stadium Sunday took a beating on that afternoon ' s quarterfinal game between Sweden and Romania , selling $ 80 tickets for $ 10 . But those who had tickets for Wednesday ' s semifinal game between Sweden and Brazil at the Rose Bowl found they were in a seller ' s market , moving $ 90 tickets for $ 150 . RANDY HARVEY
